Work History

Software Engineer / Device Engineer

  • • Developed web app with R (Shiny), SQL and python for dynamic analysis, statistical modelling, and visualization of millions of rows of 7nm finFET experimental data - Reduced report generation runtime from hours to minutes.

  • • Used bash scripting to automate data collection and preparation, and Git to work with team members.

  • • Designed, verified, and benchmarked foundry ready 7nm series and parallel stacked finFETs using Cadence/li>
